purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers (CFP) for accepted workshops at the ACM/IEEE 28th International Conference on Model Driven Engineering Languages and Systems (MODELS 2025), which will take place from October 5-10, 2025, in Grand Rapids, Michigan. It highlights the hybrid format of the event, allowing for both in-person and virtual participation. The email provides important dates for submissions and notifications, as well as a list of accepted workshops with links to their respective websites.
evidence_sentences: MODELS 2025, including the workshops, will be organized as a hybrid event with in-person and virtual participation.
MODELS 2025 will host a number of workshops during the three days before the main conference.
A list of the accepted workshops is available below, with links to workshop websites.
Important dates: Thu 3 Jul 2025 Submissions Deadline, Thu 31 Jul 2025 Notification of Authors, Thu 7 Aug 2025 Camera-ready Deadline, Sun 5 Oct - Tue 7 Oct 2025 Dates.
